name: Street King VR
description: Throughout the 2020s, violence in Logan has spiraled out of control, with areas in most major cities being taken over by youth gangs, resulting in some schools shutting down. Two major gangs vie for control. special areas known as "free fire zones" have discouraged police from entering out of fear. Logan is in the middle of a free fire zone, thus the Department of Eradication Defense (D.E.D.), a pilot special government agency, has been notified.
